item.title: UnitedHealth 称其子公司 Change Healthcare 的药房网络已重新上线
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周三表示，在遭受网络攻击数周后，其旗下 Change Healthcare 的药房网络已重新上线。【原文：UnitedHealth Group said on Wednesday that its unit Change Healthcare's pharmacy network was back online, weeks after a cyberattack.】

item.title: 生物技术行业协会将与中国药明康德拆分
item.description: 根据无锡艾普特新任首席执行官周三的一封信，一家总部位于华盛顿、代表生物技术公司的全球贸易协会正在采取措施与中国会员无锡艾普特 "分离"。【原文：A Washington-based global trade association representing biotechnology companies is taking steps to "separate" from Chinese member Wuxi AppTec , according to a letter from its new CEO on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本卡车司机工作过度、工资过低，被工资红利抛在后面
item.description: 当日本的大公司准备发放数十年来最大幅度的加薪时，卡车公司老板坂田郁子（Ikuko Sakata）却觉得自己生活在另一个现实中。【原文：As Japan's big companies prepare to hand out their heftiest pay hikes in decades, trucking firm owner Ikuko Sakata feels like she inhabits a different reality.】

item.title: 早间竞标日本与命运的约会倒计时
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家报道Vista Equity 寻求利用银行进行 Solera IPO
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周三表示，私募股权公司 Vista Equity Partners 正在为 Solera 的美国首次公开募股寻找投资银行。【原文：Private equity firm Vista Equity Partners is seeking to hire investment banks for a U.S. initial public offering of Solera, a provider of software to the automotive and insurance industries, people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请前 Global X 首席投资官担任 ETF 策略师
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）周三表示，其资产管理部门已聘请 Global X 前首席投资官乔恩-迈尔（Jon Maier）领导一个新的全球研究部门，重点研究交易所交易基金（ETF）。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co said on Wednesday its asset management division had hired Jon Maier, the former chief investment officer of Global X, to head a new global research effort focusing on exchange-traded funds (ETFs).】

item.title: SpaceX 第三次 "星际飞船 "试飞获得 FAA 绿灯
item.description: 据美国联邦航空局网站报道，美国联邦航空局（FAA）周三向 SpaceX 公司颁发了许可证，允许该公司在得克萨斯州试射星际飞船火箭系统，为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的卫星发射业务和美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的登月计划中至关重要的航天器的又一次早期演示铺平了道路。【原文：The FAA on Wednesday granted SpaceX a license to test-launch the company's Starship rocket system from Texas, according to the agency's website, paving the way for another early demonstration of a spacecraft crucial to Elon Musk's satellite launch business and NASA's moon program.】

item.title: 印度 Reliance 收购派拉蒙在 Viacom18 的股份
item.description: 印度信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）在一份监管文件中表示，该美国公司已同意以约 5.17 亿美元（428.6 亿印度卢比）的价格收购派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）持有的当地娱乐网络维亚康姆 18 媒体公司（Viacom 18 Media）13.01% 的全部股份。【原文：India's Reliance Industries has agreed to buy Paramount Global's entire 13.01% stake in local entertainment network Viacom 18 Media for about $517 million (42.86 billion Indian rupees), the U.S. company said in a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，电动汽车初创企业菲斯科准备申请破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，电动汽车初创企业菲斯科已聘请重组顾问，协助其进行可能的破产申请。【原文：Electric-vehicle start-up Fisker has hired restructuring advisers to assist with a possible bankruptcy filing, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Under Armour 创始人普兰克将重返公司担任首席执行官
item.description: 服装制造商 Under Armour 周三表示，创始人凯文-普兰克（Kevin Plank）将从 4 月 1 日起重返公司，担任首席执行官。【原文：Apparel maker Under Armour said on Wednesday that founder Kevin Plank will return to the company as CEO, effective April 1.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商 Lennar 因房屋交付量增加，第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: Lennar Corp 周三公布的第一季度利润高于华尔街预期，原因是现有房屋供应量处于历史低位，导致新房建设需求持续增长。【原文：Lennar Corp reported first-quarter profits above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as historically low existing home supply led to sustained demand for new home construction.】

item.title: 耶伦称尽管中国在出口电动汽车，但美国仍在努力确保国内电动汽车制造商取得成功
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周三表示，面对中国在电动汽车领域不断增长的出口和政府的大量补贴，拜登政府正在采取措施确保其国内电动汽车产业取得成功。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Wednesday said the Biden administration was taking steps to ensure the success of its domestic electric vehicle industry in the face of China's growing exports in the sector and heavy government subsidies.】

item.title: 因 UnitedHealth 数据泄露引发的集体诉讼不断增加
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）已经遭到至少六起集体诉讼，指控其未能在上个月支付处理部门 Change Healthcare 遭黑客攻击后保护数百万人的个人数据，而且可能还会有更多诉讼。【原文：UnitedHealth Group has already been hit with at least six class action lawsuits accusing it of failing to protect millions of people's personal data from last month's hack of Change Healthcare, its payment processing unit, with more lawsuits likely to come.】

item.title: 三位黑人银行家输掉了英国对巴克莱银行的种族歧视索赔案
item.description: 三位黑人银行家在伦敦起诉巴克莱银行，要求赔偿 5280 万英镑（6670 万美元），指控内容包括种族歧视、骚扰、伤害和损害举报人利益。【原文：Three Black bankers, who sued Barclays for a combined 52.8 million pounds ($66.7 million) in London over allegations that included race discrimination, harassment, victimisation and whistleblower detriment, have largely lost their case.】

item.title: 美国卫生部门对联合健康黑客事件展开调查
item.description: 美国卫生与公众服务部已开始对联合健康集团 Change Healthcare 部门遭受的网络攻击展开调查，该网络攻击导致药房补药和保险理赔处理中断。【原文：The U.S. Department Of Health and Human Services has opened an investigation into the cyberattack at UnitedHealth Group's Change Healthcare unit that disrupted pharmacy refills and insurance claims processing.】

item.title: ChatGPT 用户可访问《世界报》和 Prisa Media 的新闻内容
item.description: 微软支持的 OpenAI 周三表示，ChatGPT 用户将可以访问《世界报》和 Prisa Media 的法语和西班牙语新闻内容，并披露了其与媒体出版物的合作关系。【原文：ChatGPT users will get access to French and Spanish news content from Le Monde and Prisa Media, Microsoft-backed OpenAI said on Wednesday, disclosing its partnership with the media publications.】

item.title: Waymo 将开始在洛杉矶提供免费无人驾驶机器人出租车服务
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 公司周三表示，将从周四开始在洛杉矶为部分公众提供免费的无人驾驶机器人出租车服务。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo said on Wednesday it will begin offering free driverless robotaxi services to select members of the public in Los Angeles starting Thursday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，拜登将对新日铁收购美国钢铁公司的交易表示担忧
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，美国总统乔-拜登计划对新日铁拟斥资 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司一事表示严重关切。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden plans to express serious concern over Nippon Steel's proposed $14.9 billion purchase of U.S. Steel , the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: Epic Games 指控苹果违反 App Store 禁令
item.description: 制作热门视频游戏《堡垒之夜》（Fortnite）的 Epic Games 周三敦促联邦法官要求苹果公司遵守有关其利润丰厚的 App Store 运营方式的禁令。【原文：Epic Games, which makes the popular video game "Fortnite," on Wednesday urged a federal judge to require Apple to comply with an injunction governing how its lucrative App Store operates.】

item.title: NTSB 称波音 737 MAX 9 拆除门塞的录像被覆盖
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）负责人周三表示，调查人员仍不清楚在1月5日阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）空中紧急事件中涉及的波音737 MAX 9机舱门插头是由谁操作的，而且视频录像已被覆盖。【原文：The head of National Transportation Safety Board said Wednesday investigators still do not know who worked on a Boeing 737 MAX 9 door plug involved in a Jan. 5 Alaska Airlines mid-air emergency and that video footage was overwritten.】

item.title: 微软扩大其人工智能网络安全助手的可用性
item.description: 微软公司周三表示，将从 4 月 1 日起为网络安全专业人员提供更多人工智能工具，并对该助手采取 "即用即付 "的策略。【原文：Microsoft will widen the availability of its artificial intelligence-powered tool for cybersecurity professionals from April 1 and adopt a 'pay-as-you-go' strategy for the assistant, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Together AI 在 Salesforce 领投的新一轮融资中估值 12.5 亿美元
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）支持的 Together AI 初创公司周三表示，在由 Salesforce Ventures 领投的新一轮融资中，该公司以 12.5 亿美元的估值筹集了 1.06 亿美元。【原文：Nvidia-backed Together AI has raised $106 million at a valuation of $1.25 billion in a new funding round led by Salesforce Ventures, the generative artificial intelligence (AI) startup said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尼日利亚打击力度加大，Binance 仍计划让 "同事们回家"
item.description: 这家全球最大的加密货币交易所在 X 上发布消息称，Binance 正在与尼日利亚当局合作，将上个月因未披露的指控而被拘留的高级管理人员带回尼日利亚，这也是尼日利亚全国范围打击行动的一部分。【原文：Binance is working with Nigerian authorities to bring back the senior executives detained last month on undisclosed charges as part of a country-wide crackdown, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange posted on X.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求疲软，Polestar 下调即将推出车型的起售价
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车制造商Polestar汽车控股公司周三将其Polestar 3车型的基本价格下调了12%以上，并推出了新的车型，准备应对低迷的需求。【原文：Swedish electric-vehicle maker Polestar Automotive Holding , on Wednesday cut the base price of its Polestar 3 model by more than 12% and launched new variants, as it prepares to counter lackluster demand.】

item.title: 巴西财政部寻求 "中间路线 "解决各州偿债问题
item.description: 圣保罗州州长塔尔西西奥-德弗雷塔斯（Tarcisio de Freitas）周三表示，巴西财政部预计将提交一份关于各州偿债问题的提案，在要求减轻负担的争论中代表中间立场。【原文：Brazil's Finance Ministry is expected to present a proposal on debt service for states that represents a middle ground in the debate amid calls for reduced burdens, Sao Paulo Governor Tarcisio de Freitas said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 富国银行警告降价对需求的影响减弱，特斯拉业绩下滑
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）担心全球最有价值的汽车制造商降价对其电动汽车需求的影响减弱，并将其评级下调至 "减持"，特斯拉股价周三下跌约 2%。【原文：Tesla shares dropped about 2% on Wednesday after Wells Fargo raised concerns over the waning impact of price cuts by the world's most valuable automaker on the demand for its electric vehicles and downgraded them to "underweight".】

item.title: 高盛资产管理公司将恢复美国商业地产投资
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）房地产业务联席主管周三表示，今年将恢复对美国商业房地产的 "积极投资"，因为市场正在触底反弹。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management will resume "actively investing" in U.S. commercial real estate this year because the market is bottoming out, the co-head of its real estate business said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克称特斯拉工厂在纵火袭击后已恢复运行
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三表示，特斯拉位于柏林郊外的欧洲千兆工厂已恢复运转，并感谢员工在上周工厂因纵火袭击断电后给予的支持。【原文：Tesla's European gigafactory outside Berlin is back online, Elon Musk said on Wednesday, thanking staff for their support after the plant lost power last week due to an arson attack.】

item.title: 伦敦清算所表示正在考虑清算美国国债
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团的伦敦清算所（LCH）美洲业务主管约翰-霍尔坎（John Horkan）周三在佛罗里达州博卡拉顿举行的期货业协会会议上表示，伦敦证券交易所集团的伦敦清算所（LCH）业务正在考虑为美国国债进行清算。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group's London Clearing House (LCH) business is looking into clearing U.S. Treasuries, its head of Americas John Horkan said Wednesday at a conference hosted by the Futures Industry Association in Boca Raton, Florida.】

item.title: 麦当劳首席财务官称，受中东和中国市场影响，海外销售额将进一步下滑
item.description: 麦当劳首席财务官伊恩-博登（Ian Borden）周三表示，受中东冲突和中国需求疲软的影响，本季度麦当劳的国际销售额将连续下降，这使得其股价在早盘交易中下跌了 2%。【原文：McDonald's international sales will fall sequentially in the current quarter, pressured by the conflict in the Middle East and demand weakness in China, CFO Ian Borden said on Wednesday, sending its shares down 2% in early trade.】
